alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 28 at 1:18PM CST until November 29 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TO 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Eastern Culberson County, and Davis Mountains Foothills. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ to 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County
